Chinese Delegations Here 
   Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Chinese People's Daily led by President Wang Chen and a delegation of the Chinese Institute of Contemporary International Relations led by its Vice-President Ji Zhi Ye, arrived here on Monday.
 The delegations were greeted at the airport by Om Il Gyu, deputy editor of Rodong Sinmun, Jang Yun Gon, vice-director of the International Affairs Institute, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy official.

articles.title: Greetings to Yemeni President
Kim Yong Nam Meets Nigerian Party Delegation
articles.content:
Greetings to Yemeni President 
   Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh on the occasion of the 16th national day of Yemen.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished the president and the people of Yemen greater successes in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country.
